comment.body:
> [border0464fred](#comment_1_18XR5C5AxGfD5s2DbCPGuXxVN5oscoLyD6): Any doc with javascript ? I don't want to learn this coffeeScript thing. And seem like I would not have to do it as it run in javascript in reality. (from What I understand)

ES6 Version of ZeroFrame - https://gist.github.com/GomZik/02e85df5fb7a5eb819cd
Oh. See on other owned sites, but not on my blog. Is it too old?

> [nofish](#comment_212_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It's only visible if your site's content.json file contains a "cloned_from" entry and you seeding that site.

Can I add this key manually? Can I link to this blog?

> [nofish](#comment_213_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Yes, add "cloned_from": "1BLogC9LN4oPDcruNz3qo1ysa133E9AGg8", then press "Update" at your site's sidebar to reload the content.json file.After that you should have the Upgrade code button. (please backup your site's directory before pressing it)

Works fine, but not know difference between my old version and current :)

> [nofish](#comment_214_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You should see this: Easier post formatting

Got it, thank you!
